General.Name: INTERSHOP Communications Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: INTERSHOP Communications Aktiengesellschaft offers B2B ecommerce solutions in Germany and internationally. It operates in two segments, Software and Cloud, and Service. The company provides commerce platform for commerce management, order management, product information management, experience management, customer engagement center, and BI data hub. In addition, it offers implementation, go-live support, and project management services; training services; and customer and support services. It serves manufacturing, wholesale, retail, B2C, B2X, and B2B sectors. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Jena, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Markus  Klahn
0.Title: CEO, COO & Chairman of the Management Board
